wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Tosswill Norwood Perkins (19 December 1870 – 26 July 1946) was an English schoolmaster, a cricketer who played first-class cricket for Cambridge University and Kent, and a footballer who captained the university side at Cambridge.

response: *Thomas Perkins (cricketer) (1870–1946), English cricketer, footballer and schoolmaster
